location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4244 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of past correspondence. Malet writes that the Government approves of Kemball's proceedings in relation to the recent seizure of thirty-six slaves imported into Lingah [Bandar-e Lingeh].
